title: Day 1
data: Depart from Delhi in the Afternoon to the most picturesque hill station.
Overnight journey and fun in a comfortable & premium AC bus

title: Day 2
data: Arrival at Manali, check-in at the hotel, freshen up and get some rest.
Explore the beauty of Manali and proceed for local sightseeing
After enjoying the exciting tour of Manali city, return back to the hotel by evening, Excursion dinner will be served accompanied by the most amazing DJ night and bonfire.

title: Day 3
data: Wake up early in the morning and get mesmerized by the beautiful sunrise.
After breakfast at hotel, we'll proceed to explore Solang Valley, Atal tunnel & Sissu which are known for their scenic beauty
Return to the hotel and have dinner with music night

title: Day 4
data: Try some adventure activities on the way like Paragliding/Rafting (at own cost)
Overnight stay in the most amazing property of kasol

title: Day 5
data: Enjoy the local markets and try different cuisines at cafes of Kasol.

title: Day 6
data: Return to Delhi and conclude the trip with a bag full of amazing memories!
